subject: Re: [junit] Re: UI testing am I being lazy?
msgSnippet: Thomas L Roche wrote:  ... Very well.... You should have a good reason for not writing both tests, because more often than not, you need them both. --
messageBody:
Thomas L Roche wrote:
<snip />
> J. B. Rainsberger Mon, 07 Jun 2004 18:11:30 -0400
> > in the long run, and as a general practice, you /want/ both tests.
>
> as well as the facts that all practices are specific, and in the long
> run, we're all dead :-)

Very well....

You should have a good reason for not writing both tests, because more
often than not, you need them both.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
